Subskills.name: Double the Fuel
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bombardment.

Subskills.name: Spikeballrdment
Subskills.description: Chance for bombs to turn into spike balls dealing increased physical damage.

Subskills.name: All Around Annihilation
Subskills.description: Unleash bombardment in a circle around you increasing bomb damage over time.

Subskills.name: Full Body Workout
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of bombardment.

Subskills.name: Massive Strike
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bombardment also increasing the cooldown.

Subskills.name: Fire Charges
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Factory Upgrade
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile size of bombardment.

Subskills.name: ICBM
Subskills.description: Launch an intercontinental ballistic missile towards target location dealing damage on a large radius leaving the ground blazing with flames dealing a portion of the damage over time.

Subskills.name: Efficient Production
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile amount of bombardment.

Subskills.name: Solid Explosive Fuel
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of bombardment explosions.

Subskills.name: Casual Bombing
Subskills.description: Throw a single wave of bombs removing the cooldown from bombardment.

Subskills.name: Clusterbombing
Subskills.description: Call down raining bombs on multiple nearby monsters. The raining bombs have a chance to unleash smaller bombs after exploding.

Subskills.name: Big Bo-Ombing
Subskills.description: Unleash a single trail of big bo-oms with increased damage and area of effect radius.
